Are you at the cross-roads to choose your career path between Technology and Management?

What if you had the chance to excel in both the domains?

Indian Institute of Technology, Madras (IITM) and Indian Institute of Management, Bangalore (IIMB) have been front runners in providing quality education in their respective domains for several years. Robert Bosch Centre for Data Science and AI, IIT Madras and IIMBx, IIM Bangalore have now collaborated to provide a Certificate Programme in "Technology and Management" (CTM) to transform your career to the next level.

The 11 month programme will comprise technical courses from IIT Madras and management courses from IIM Bangalore. Besides learning the core management courses, the students will have an opportunity to choose one of the two technical disciplines offered, namely Data Sciences and Machine Learning.

This collaborative online programme brings together an active learning blend of Technology and Management, by imparting knowledge about the current market trends in both the streams. It empowers you with a unique cross-functional skillset essential to cater to the emerging business needs.

In addition, you will experience the IIT Madras and IIM Bangalore classrooms through campus connect sessions, where you will have opportunities to interact with the faculty for case study and project discussions.

On successful completion of the programme, the learners receive a Certificate in Technology and Management.

The programme is scheduled to begin in March 2019. Registrations are open.

Broaden your horizon and equip yourself with the best in-class certification. To know more and apply, visit https://ctm-iitm.iimbx.edu.in/
